resources.string: SQRL
You can login to a site on this device by tapping on the QR code in the browser.
The link was not valid.
Confirm
This is not the right site
Could not display the confirm/deny site buttons.
The account already exists.
The account does not yet exist.
Something went wrong.
Contacting server...
A transient error occurred. The sender should resend the request using the new nut and qry values.
The uri scheme %s is not supported.
The required nut parameter was not present.
You must enable test mode before calling await.
Could not sign the message using the identities private key.
\"tif\" value in server response was not hexadecimal.
An unknown error occurred.
Query function is not supported by server.
According to the server, something about the request was incorrect.
A \"bad id association\" error occurred. Perhaps the wrong SQRL Identity was used?
The \"%s\" parameter was not present in server response.
Servers response was in an unrecognised format.
The status code of the servers response was %d instead of 200.
Would you like to create an account?
Yes
No
Authorisation request failed.
Authorisation request sent.
Confirm site name
Scan QR
Login
Create New Identity

To make sure your new identity is as secure as possible, shake the camera and wave it as many different things as possible until the bar turns green. For extra security, keep shaking and waving the camera after the bar has turned green, the longer the better.
The camera service is not supported by this system.
There are no available cameras.
This app requires permission to use the camera! Please enable it in the phones settings.
The camera is no longer available for use.
An error occurred whilst trying to open the camera.
The camera configuration failed.
The raw image format is not supported by the given camera.
Create
An identity with this name already exists.
The identities could not be loaded from disk.
The identity could not be written to disk.
Identity:
Delete Identity
The identity has been successfully deleted.
The identity \"%s\" does not exist.
The identity \"%s\" could not be deleted.
You must create an identity in order to use this application. Your identity will be used to log in to websites, and will not take long to create.
The provided master key was invalid.
A failure occurred while trying to generate the SQRL keypair.
Next
Enter New Password

Please enter the password you would like to use to protect your identity. It needs to be as strong as possible to protect against bad guys, so make it as long and random as you can! You will need to enter it every time you login to a site.
Enter password...
Enter password again...
The password contained a NUL character, illegal for use with SQRL.
Enter Password
Enter the password for the selected identity.
Verifying password...
You didn\'t give me a password!
That password was incorrect!
Logging in
In order to protect your identity against people who might steal your device, it needs to be encrypted using your password for 5 seconds.
Encrypting Identity
The response contained bad base64.
Done
